Detailed Description

Exception handler.

Extend the default PHP Exception handler .

Author:
Oscar van Eijk, Oveas Functionality Provider
Version:
Jul 29, 2008 -- O van Eijk -- Initial version

Create an overview of the calling stack

Parameters:
[in] $textmode specify the format in which the stackdump should be returned; text (true, default) of HTML (false).

Parameters:

[in] $step Number of the call
